article_title: State Senate election battles to watch this fall in Kentucky
article_text: Races this fall for the Kentucky Senate are not getting as much attention as those for the Kentucky House, but the Senate is offering up some spirited elections, along with the possibilities of the first Latino and the first Muslim to serve in the Kentucky General Assembly.
